ProjectTitle: Leveraging droplet microfluidics and nucleic acid engineering for development of a CRISPR-based cell imaging toolbox
InitialFeedbackHistory:
27/03/2023
Data: please also include the samples that you collect, these are your physical data, do the need special management, storage under special conditions for example? 
Metadata: Metadata may be generated by instruments during measurements or applied when deposited in a repository, for more information see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Preservation: Preserving data on hard drives is not very secure, please have a look at the storage guide for alternatives: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: In life sciences many disciplinary repositories are available that may make your data more findable, have a look at EBI for example: https://www.ebi.ac.uk/submission/ if there is no suitable repository you can use RDR. If you have human genomics data please check with the legal department before sharing: https://admin.kuleuven.be/sab/jd/en
label: good with suggestions
